title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set, but in expression builder, the old column names are still displayed when selecting the dataset.
OB: When I set an alias for columns in a data set, the expression builder still shows the original column names instead of the aliases when selecting the dataset.
EB: I expect the expression builder to display the aliases that I have set for the columns when selecting the dataset.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a data set with columns. 
2. Set aliases for the columns. 
3. Open the expression builder. 
4. Select the data set. 
5. Observe that the expression builder displays the old column names instead of the aliases.
